text.text: What is the purpose of the Inbox in ZOLL Billing?

text: You can use your Inbox to view and work claims that are assigned to you.

text.text: How can I access my Inbox?

text: Click Inbox on the navigation bar.

text.text: What options are available for sorting claims in the Inbox?

text:
You can sort claims in the Inbox by:

* Status
* Type
* Date
* Customer

text.text: Describe the process of filtering claims in the Inbox.

text:
You can filter claims in the Inbox by:

* Status
* Type
* Date
* Customer

text.text: How do I manage the columns displayed in their Inbox?

text: You can configure which columns of information display in your Inbox by clicking 'Customize columns' on the upper right.

text.text: What actions can I take when working with claims in your Inbox?

text:
You can take the following actions when working with claims in your Inbox:

* Select a claim number to enter into a workflow
* Pick the claims you want to work to create a customized work queue
* Check the box on the front of the row of the claims you want to work
* Click Work selected claims
* Click Skip to next claim
* Click View my queue
* Click the claim number you want to work on from the list of claims that display in the window
* Click Clear queue
* Click Work queue on the navigation bar
* Enter the claim number in the search field and click the search icon
* Click the claim number to go to the Claim page
* Click Schedule follow - up reminder
* Select the date from the calendar
* Click Save
* Click Dashboard on the navigation bar
* Click the Work button associated with the incomplete claims

text.text: Explain the concept of a work queue in ZOLL Billing.

text: A work queue is a list of claims that you have selected to work on. You can create a work queue from the Dashboard (made up of unassigned claims) or from your Inbox (made up of claims assigned to you). A work queue is saved for seven days.

text.text: How do you create a work queue from your Inbox?

text:
To create a work queue from your Inbox, follow these steps:

1. Click Inbox on the navigation bar.
2. From the list of claims on your Inbox, check the box on the front of the row of the claims you want to work.
3. When you are all done selecting claims, click Work selected claims.

text.text: Can I cancel a work queue once it's started?

text: Yes, you can cancel a work queue once it's started. To cancel a work queue, click View my queue. Then, click Clear queue.

text.text: What happens to custom work queues after seven days?

text: Custom work queues are saved for seven days. After seven days, the work queue will be deleted.
